Articles.Content: I have the latest version of kerbal installed and tried installing the ISA mapsat mod. The parts show up in their respective categories but I'm game the icon to use the mapsat in the lower left of the screen does not appear. How do I fix this?

/KSP_win/GameData/Innsewerants Space Agency/Plugins/PluginData/ISA_MapSat

This must be a valid path.
